snippet.title: Circuit: Demolition Derby 2 - Mobile Game on iOS/Android
snippet.description:
Android: https://goo.gl/w2Jz55
iOS: https://goo.gl/IoJDhG

Smash and Bang your way to the lead in this fun and exciting Demolition game inspired by Banger Racing and Demolition Derby races all around the world.

With the great success of Circuit: Demolition Derby from Beer Money Games we wanted to keep adding new features to the game. In fact we started adding so many more features it became an entirely new game!

Features Include:
• Free Drive mode
• City Traffic
• 15 Race Tracks
• 4 Demolition Derby Arenas!
• 10 Unique Cars
• Engine Upgrades
• Add Boost To Each Car
• Custom Paint
• Wheel Changer
• Custom Window Tint
• Change Your Car Number
• Post Race Replay
